description: Thanks for use this wallpaper...My English is so bad that sometime i cant understand what you say.sorry about that Change the default backgroud pic： get in your steam install adress and find the adress steam/steamapps/workshop/content/431960/824548506 use a same name jpg file to replace the demo-1-bg.jpg under the /img delete clock： delete the 22th code in index.html or replace it by this code: update in 1.11： there is a clock 3.11： correct a stupid mistake（TUE=>THU you can make the clock in 12-hour in /js/.time.js 4.18： thx @nicandris it will removes the animation if the mouse moves out of that screen.
title: Time lapse
